text: Henric king gret his scirereuan & his þeinas of Lundene & on Essaxan & on Hortfordscire & on Middelsexan.

And ic kyþe eow þet ic habbe geunnan Maurice bisceope þæt bissceoperice on Lundone mid saca and mid soka and mid tol & mid teame & mid infangeneþeofe & griþbrice binnan burc & butan big strande & big lande on tide & of tide & ealle þa gricthe þe into þam cristendome gebyrað on minan lande.

And on ælces oðres mannes lande ofer eall þæt bisceoperice on morðspecce & on unrichthæmed & on unrichtweorc & on ealle þingan swa full & swa forð swa aenig his foregengla <þæt> <fyrmest> hæfde & swa swa mine fæder & mine fbroder hetan & gewan mit heora gewrite.
And herto is gewitnesse Robert bisceop of Lincolne.
And þæt wæs gehaton Westminynstre on Cristesmessa.
